commit message: set version to 4.5-SNAPSHOT and code to 19
Add the gradle wrapper files to the repo.

Update build.gradle and add eventbus to the dependency list.

Also added packaging exclusions for the Bouncy Castle META-INF files.
Update the homescreen widget background to be much nicer.
Move to gradle 1.5.0
update gradlew exec-permissions for travis-ci.
update .travis.yml file

update travis.yml - add 'tools' components.

https://github.com/travis-ci/travis-ci/issues/5036#issuecomment-153297292
update travis.yml - added m2repository component.
update travis.yml - move tools component to the top
merged GH PR 60
made background colour of widget whith server running a little lighter, see GH pr #60
switched to dependency management, outcommented 'eventbus' as it is currently not used, removed JARs and src-zips
added support for public key auth with DSA keys, see GH issue #61 (likely to be changed again as ECDSA is not supported by j2ssh-maverick)
merge GH PR #62 which adds anonymous login
Some refactoring, cleanup and reformatting of GH PR #62 (anonymous login). Added german texts, implemented anonymous login for SFTP.
Did some whitespace/indentation clean up
refactored check if password is mandatory
fixed display of servers state when they could not be started due to an exception (e.g. when pub key auth is configured but key not present)
made text a little shorter
Merged some changes from GH PR #63: launchMode=singleTop and stop intent for notification. Not using eventbus yet as it provides more potential to refactor and simplify things.
added handling of sym links, see GH issue #57
Refactored to use eventbus. Makes UI updates on server start/stop much easier. See GH PR #63.
Now showing activity when user tries to start server via widget and password is not set. See GH PR #63.
added support for older android api version 15, added api version checks where necessary (notification and servers announce, hiding preference), see GH issue #56
avoiding 2nd UI update when both servers are started by checking timestamp of last event
added check for intent action, as advised by linter
added PowerToggles Plugin, refactored non activity UI updates on server start/stop again, see GH issue #54
added Tasker Plugin, so far it is implemented as a toggle to start/stop servers, see GH issue #54
changed tasker plugin: added new activity to select one of three server actions, see GH issue #54
added recently implemented features to readme
updated widget colors: made green background less light and using black as text color
added tasker condition plugin, refactored existing tasker stuff, needs more love, see GH issue #54
added transparency to widget background
fixes for tasker condition plugin, still issue that condition is not queried when requested, see GH issue #54
added check if wakeLock.isHeld() before releasing it, shall avoid crashes, see GH issue #66
small update to readme
set version to 4.5
